title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for a Domestic Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with MJC Admin permissions is viewing a Domestic Amateur profile
AND user is able to access the Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with MJC Admin permissions is viewing an International Amateur profile
AND user is able to access the Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player 
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to run the No Trade report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "No Trade Report" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND he report will have an LDAP associated with it

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Payroll Forecast Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Payroll Forecast" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report should have an LDAP associated with it

title: As a user I want saving a new investigation to send the player profile information to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a new investigation has been created for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation is saved
custom_expected:
THEN  the player's profile information is sent to LARI. If the profile had previously been sent to LARI it is sent as a "player update".
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want profile updates on profiles that have been sent to LARI to a registration profile to be sent to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player profile has been previously sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN one or more fields updated that are typically sent to LARI
custom_expected: THEN the updates should be sent to LARI as a player update.

title: As a user I want investigation results entered in LARI to be reflected in ebis
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player profile has been previously sent to LARI
custom_steps: When investigation results are entered in LARI
custom_expected: THEN the investigation information should be communicated back to ebis according to the business rules and the data discovery of the Investigation Form.

title: As a user I want saving a new investigation to send the investigation information to LARI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a new investigation has been created for a player
AND Age/ID results are NOT set to N/A
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation is saved
custom_expected:
THEN the investigation should be sent to LARI
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a user I want certain Investigation results to be communicated back to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an investigation has been created for a Player in ebis
custom_steps: WHEN the investigation result is updated in ebis to be "Waived"
custom_expected: THEN this result should be communicated back to LARI

title: As a user I want files attached to an Investigation Form to be communicated back to LARI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an investigation has been created for a player and saved
AND user has opened the investigation form in edit mode
AND user has attached new files
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save on the investigation form
custom_expected:
THEN system should check for the presence of any new attached files since the last save
AND system should send newly attached files to LARI

title: As a User, I want to search for Winter League Request Transactions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Advance Search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Winter League Request" under "Search Type"
custom_expected:
THEN "Decision" will be the filters under the Transaction search type
AND Filter will be a Select2
AND Possible Values will be "Granted" and "Denied"
AND Conducting an advanced search will return the standard result columns for a transaction search
AND "Decision" will be included in the result columns

title: As a User, I want to receive an error if the player has an Offseason Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Winter League Request for a player 
AND the player selected as an Offseason Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Winter League Request
custom_expected:
THEN if  the request is on or after 6/1, system should look for offseason assignments from 6/1 of current year to 5/31 of next year
BUT if request is before 6/1, system should look for offseason assignments from 6/1 of last year to 5/31 of current year
AND if an approved offseason assignment is found system should display message: "Invalid Winter League Request.  Player was assigned via an Offseason Assignment on <date> to play for <club>."

title: As a user I want profile updates on profiles that have pending Investgiations to be sent to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Player Profile has a Pending investigation associated with it
custom_steps: WHEN one or more fields that are typically sent to LARI are updated on the Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the updates should be sent to LARI as a player update
AND this should occur on grandfathered player profiles, professional player profiles, international registration player profiles and domestic amateur profiles

title: As a BOC user I want to have the option to link an investigation request to an existing investigation on approval of a request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an investigation request has been submitted for a player
AND a BOC user is logged in with permissions for investigation requests
custom_steps: WHEN the BOC user is viewing the Investigation Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should display only a standard "Approve" button if the player has no investigations in the system
BUT if the player has at least one investigation in the system, the user should see a split button that allows the BOC to choose whether or not they want to start a new Investigation, or add this request to an existing Investigation form
AND if the user clicks Approve - Create New, then the Investigation Request will be marked approved and the player will have a new investigation created as laid out in #139513527
BUT if the user clicks Approve - Add to Existing, then the system will do the following: 
 -Save any changes that were made to the form. Mark the investigation request as approved and display a successful approval notification
 - If only one investigation exists for the player then the system should automatically add the club who submitted the request as a requesting Org for the existing investigation
 - If more than one investigation exists in the system for the player - the system should display a pop-up prompting the user to select to which investigation to add the requesting Org
 - If the visibility of the Investigation was set to include "Requesting Org" then the Org that submitted this request should now be able to see the investigation in the Player's History
 - The player's Investigation History should be updated. Club should be notified of the approval of their request. See Clipboard #2.

title: On screen sizes under 768px decrease the space surrounding all main elements on forms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing EBIS on a screen size under 768px
custom_steps: WHEN the user views any transaction, profile, contract, or dashboard tabs that contain a form
custom_expected: THEN spacing will match wireframe from attached story

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Trade Checklist from a Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with print permissions for Waiver Claim Assignments
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the WCA in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a Print button at the bottom of the form
AND clicking on the button should allow the user to choose to print a Trade Checklist
AND printing the Trade Checklist should generate a trade checklist for the WCA just like for an outright trade

title: As a user I want to be able to delete MJ Contracts in post-preliminary states
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC admin user is logged in with delete permissions for MJ contracts
custom_steps: WHEN a user opens an MJ Contract that they have permission to edit
custom_expected:
THEN if the contract is in a Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed), user should see a "Delete" button
AND clicking "Delete" should prompt the user that they wish to permanently delete the contract (as it works now for Preliminary)
AND if user confirms - the contract should be deleted from the system and a blue successful delete notification should be displayed

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to delete an investigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC Investigations Admin user (not registration user) is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an Investigation, in Edit or View mode, that has been previously saved
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Delete" button
AND clicking "Delete" should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the investigation
AND confirming they want to delete the investigation should delete the investigation from the system and display a blue successful delete notification
AND deleted notifications should no longer display in search for anyone and should not appear in Investigation Histories

title: As a User, I want to Initialize Arb Eligible Tables for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility 
AND user is viewing the Arb Eligible Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user chooses a year that has not been initialized
custom_expected:
THEN all filters (not Year) should be disabled 
AND an Initialize button should be available
 AND clicking Initialize should load the arb eligibles tables
AND this should include setting Arb Status and Elig Counts, based on calculations provided by Dev
 AND after Initialize is clicked, all filters should become active

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Winter League Requests report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Winter League Requests " is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report should have an LDAP associated with it

title: As a User, I want the Arb Eligibles tables to get updated when transactions that affect arb eligibility occur
custom_preconds: GIVEN a transaction exists that impacts the Arb Eligibility
custom_steps: WHEN a transaction occurs that affects arb eligibility
custom_expected:
THEN the arb eligible table should be updated
 AND this should include but should not be limited to adding players, removing players, setting Elig Counts, and updating Arb Status
